Summary: silver with blue and red x on it
trends: There have been no other sightings in Meadow Vista
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy sister and i where driving home and saw a light above a small mountain . so we stoped to look at it and as soon as we did it started to come right at us. it flew directly over us wisper quite at about 200 yards. it was boomerang shape and silver like the inside of a soda can and had a red and a blue x on the bottom center of ship. As it started to turn slightly traveling away from us , what looked like a star came out of the center rear and head towards us and stop in the sky , and just stayed there as the craft got alittle futher away another ( star ) came out the rear and stayed in the sky as the ship flu away. we got back in the car and headed towards home , same direction as the mountain we first saw it,, and it was right back there doing whaterver it was doing ?????? we where a little scared but mostly AMASED
